item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:-119 Chances: Shopify (SHOP) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately, indicating a potential positive sentiment towards the stock. Great companies in steadily growing industries can deliver enviable returns through the years, suggesting a positive outlook for Shopify’s future growth potential.
